original_text: “They shall make an ark of acacia wood. Two cubits and a half shall be its length, a cubit and a half its breadth, and a cubit and a half its height.
korean_text: 그들은 조각목으로 궤를 짜되 길이는 두 규빗 반, 너비는 한 규빗 반, 높이는 한 규빗 반이 되게 하고

sentences.original_text: They shall make an ark of acacia wood.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 아카시아 나무로 궤를 만들어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Two cubits and a half shall be its length,
a cubit and a half its breadth,
and a cubit and a half its height.
